problems.title: Reverse an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers, reverse the array in-place (without using extra space) and print the reversed array.

Input Format
First line contains integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print the array in reversed order, elements separated by space.

Example 1
Input:
6
1 2 3 4 5 6

Output:
6 5 4 3 2 1

Example 2
Input:
5
10 20 30 40 50

Output:
50 40 30 20 10
hintsList: Swap elements from start and end moving towards center
Use two pointers: i = 0 and j = n-1

problems.title: Count Odd Numbers in an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
You are given an array of N integers. Your task is to count and return how many numbers in the array are odd.

Input Format
First line contains integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print a single integer — the count of odd numbers.

Example 1
Input:
6
1 2 3 4 5 6

Output:
3

Explanation: 1, 3, 5 are odd

Example 2
Input:
5
2 4 6 8 10

Output:
0
